name: Tab Tree for Arc-Dark
description: Tab Tree theme for the Arc-Dark GTK Theme and matching Firefox Theme. Based on my same theme for GNOME/Adwaita Dark
additional_info: Download Tab Tree Extension Download Arc Theme for Firefox V1.4 - Minor tweaks to search box to better match theme V1.3 - Better looking new-tab and pinned tab buttons - Hover effect on tabs - Other slight tweaks - Added optional tweaks for people that are using the HTitle extension V1.2 - Added options for tab height and pinned tabs toolbar visibility. V1.0 - Initial Release

style_setting_options.label: Enabled
